name: OTT details
description: Get Streaming details of Movie and TV Shows. We support 150+ Streaming platforms in US and India such as HBO, YouTube, Netflix , Primve Video, Hotstar, Hulu, etc . (use our OTT Providers endpoint to get the full list OTT providers we support) . In additon to streaming info we also provide basic details on any given movie title.

api_methods.name: Params
api_methods.description: Get array of values that can be used as params in Advanced Search .

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: input 'genre' or 'language' to get array of genre or languages that can be used as filter in advanced search .

utterances.utterance: What are the available genres for filtering movies?
Can you list the languages I can use to filter TV shows?
Show me the genres supported for advanced search.
What languages are available to narrow down my search for movies?
I need a list of genres to filter my streaming options.
Could you provide the languages I can use to filter TV shows?
What are the genre options for advanced search?
List the languages I can use to filter my movie search.
Give me the genres available for filtering streaming content.
What are the language filters I can apply to my TV show search?
